title: TouchMovementMode

name: TouchMovementMode
type: enum
summary: |
  The movement mode used by a client with a TouchEnabled device.
description: |
  The TouchMovementMode Enum is used to change the movement controller on Roblox
  Mobile.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      The default movement controller.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Thumbstick
    summary: |
      Change the movement controller to the classic thumbstick.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DPad
    summary: |
      Change the movement controller to the DPad.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Thumbpad
    summary: |
      Change the movement controller to the thumbpad.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: ClickToMove
    summary: |
      Change the movement controller to click to move.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: DynamicThumbstick
    summary: |
      Change the movement controller to the dynamic thumbstick.
    value: 5
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
